{"step_by_step_thinking": "Habits developed under psychological cause can be analyzed by considering the nature and origin of the habit. Non-compulsive habits are not necessarily developed under psychological causes, so option A can be eliminated. Unintentional habits are also not directly related to psychological causes, so option B can be eliminated as well. Useful habits can be developed under psychological causes, but they can also be developed under other causes, so option C is not the most accurate choice. Intentional habits, on the other hand, are consciously developed and can be influenced by psychological factors, making option D the most suitable choice.", "answer_choice": "D"}
